thread.title: Kentucky College Gets Tax Exemption in Budget Deal

author: Michelle Hackman
title: Kentucky College Gets Tax Exemption in Budget Deal

organizations.name: kentucky college gets tax exemption in budget deal

text:
WASHINGTON—Berea College, the small tuition-free school embroiled in a partisan fight over Republicans’ tax law, will be exempted from a new levy on large university endowments under the budget deal reached by congressional leaders Wednesday night.
The college, located in Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell’s home state of Kentucky, boasts a $1 billion endowment and educates about 1,700 students per year. That ratio means the college qualifies as one of roughly 30 schools required to pay the new tax, which Republican lawmakers...
